::Prowl::

Through unfocused optics, Prowl sees Iron Raptor lean closer to him, feeling 
her touching his cheek. Her hand on his shoulder and the sound of her voice 
was comforting to him, taking his mind off the pain, which was reduced to a 
numb throbbing in his side. His hand lifts to her cheek, but then falls back 
to the floor, the drain of power by his repair systems too much for his other 
systems to function properly. His spark's repair system retreats back into 
his chest, leaving him low on energy.

Prowl's optics close as he nearly loses conciousness, but then open to look 
at his love, smiling when he sees the concern in her optics and returning it 
with a look of love. He raises his hand again to stroke her cheek, his 
systems regaining power to a level enough to support movement. His hand turns 
her head toward his, his lips meeting hers in a kiss. He grabs on to the 
wall, pulling himself up and looking at Iron Raptor. His own systems were 
doing better now that his spark had repaired him slightly, but Iron Raptor 
was still injured.

"Get yourself repaired. I'll go help repair the Ark," he says, looking at her 
with concern in his optics.
